授業目的: The main purpose of all my literature courses is to enable students to familiarize authentic literary texts in English. For this purpose, interesting fantasy stories written for juvenile readers are selected, so that you can read a whole book enjoyably without so much difficulties. This course (and the course B2), focuses primarily on reading and creating stories. You will read shorter books, discuss the story extensively, and create your own stories. In short, the course will provide you with interesting reading, discussions, and creative writing opportunities.
到達目標:
1. You will be able to read stories written in authentic English and understand the benefits of reading them.
2. You will be able to discuss what you've read with connecting your own thoughts and experiences.
3. You will be able to create a new story based on your own ideas.
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
- For the students permitted to take classes online: You will participate in within-class zoom sessions.
- Reading, students' presentations, and discussions are the main activities of the course.
